ch.bfh.bti7301.hs2013.gravis.core

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.bti7301.hs2013.gravis.core.Core
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICore

     class Core
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICore
    This class gives access to all important methods of the core classes (facade pattern).
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch), Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
